traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The badger has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1 damage) slashing damage.
